faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.option1text:
Vision

To professionalize the sports industry by connecting all its members so that many more opportunities can be created to enable the sector's definitive growth and expansion.

Mission

Impulsyn's mission is to help anyone in the sports industry, from both the corporate and sports areas, to connect with other members, find new opportunities or develop their academic background within their sports disciplines.

About us

Impulsyn was born in the year 2020, in Alex Zusammen study room, founder of Impulsyn.

Alex Zusammen is also the CEO and the company's management team is composed by the OneTec Group, a prestigious company in the technology sector, and some professionals from different worldwide top sports and technological organizations.
faqs.option2: The importance of completing your profile
faqs.option2text:
What does completing your profile involve?

Completing your profile implies completing your "Experience", "Education" and "Skills" areas. In order to optimize your profile, we recommend you to start posting highlights that will appear on the news feed of the users with whom you are connected, as well as getting accumulated in the "Highlights" section on your profile.

Why is so important to complete your profile?

Completing your profile is important to make a good impression on the rest of the users. Your profile is your identity mark, where you can show what you do in the sports industry, share your experience, your academic background, your skills and your best moments through different posts. It is important that you have all this updated since you never know who can view your profile and for what purpose. Many times it will be out of curiosity and other times it will be viewed by users who are interested in collaborating with you in projects, offer you a new opportunity, or simply connect with you.

How to complete your "Experiencie"
  • Log in to your profile and access your "Experience" section. Click on the editable one.
  • You will be able to add a new experience or edit an existing one that you have already created.
  • An experience can be a job or an activity that you have done by representing an organization (for instance if you are an athlete and you play for a club).
  • The experience will be used to show the rest of the members your career within sports.
How to complete your "Education"
  • Go to your profile and access your "Education" section. Click on the editable one.
  • You will be able to add a new educational experience or edit a current one you have already created.
  • An educational experience can be a degree, a master's degree or any course you have taken. The other users will be able to see your education background in sports and where you have studied.
How to complete your "Skills"
  • Go to your profile and access your "Skills" section. Click on the editable one.
  • You can add a maximum of 10 skills.
faqs.option3text:
How to post on your wall?

You can post on your wall whenever you want by clicking on the floating button on your home page .

You can share text, links, pictures, videos up to 1 minute long and mention other users (with whom you are connected) and pages .

Which content can you post ?

Impulsyn is a social network with the objective of professionalizing the sports industry by creating many more opportunities for the entire sector. Depending on your role within sports you will be able to post different type of highlights . The important thing is that the content you post is related to your sports activity and allows you to share everything you consider of interest to other users in the sector. For instance, if you are an athlete, you can upload videos of your games , share your best moments and show all your skills . If you work in the corporate area of sports, you will be able to upload videos, pictures of special moments, or links to websites with aspects that you want to highlight within your area of work .

Who is able to see the content on your wall?

All your posts will be stored in your profile . You can edit or delete them whenever you want . Your posts will appear also on the news feed of the users you are connected to . Depending on whether you have a public or private profile, more users will be able to view it .
faqs.option4text:
The NETWORKING section

Your NETWORKING section is located in your main menu (bottom menu). There, you can search, find and connect with other members of the sports industry who use Impulsyn.

How can you send messages to other users?

You will be able to send and receive messages from users with whom you are connected. In order to send a message to a user you are connected with, you can enter his/her profile and click on the "send message" button.

You can also go directly to the messaging section visible on the right side of your top menu and click on the floating button to create a new message.

Accept or reject a connection request

You can accept or reject connection requests. All connection requests will be sent to your NETWORKING section. If you accept a connection request from another user, even if you have your account in private mode, they will be able to see your profile and all the posts you do on your wall.
faqs.option5text:
What is an opportunity?

An opportunity is an offer posted by an organization which can be either a job opportunity or an opportunity to collaborate, represent or play (in the case of an athlete) for an organization without any remuneration.

For example, an opportunity can be a job posted by a sports organization that is looking for a marketing manager and an opportunity can also be an offer posted by a regional soccer club that is looking for players for the new season.

How can you apply to an opportunity?

You can apply and submit your application to an opportunity posted by an organization or you can save it in your "favorites" in case you don't have time to fill out the form at that time and you want to do it later.

To apply, simply:

  • Access your OPPORTUNITIES section located in your main menu (bottom menu)
  • Access the opportunity that interests you in your opportunity search engine.
  • Click on "apply" or save it to your favorites.

*You can also access the page of any organization of your interest and access their OPPORTUNITIES section. There you can apply as well to any specific opportunity already posted.
faqs.option6text:
What is the ACADEMICS section?

How can you request information about any academic program?

We want to help you find all the academic offer related to any sport at all levels, from undergraduate and graduate programs, to any course or academic program specialized in a specific sport or sports studies.

How can you request information about any academic program?

You can request information from any academic program posted by any academic organization or you can save it in your "favorites" in case you don't have time to complete the form at that time and want to do it later.

To request information, just follow the next steps:

  • Access your ACADEMICS section located in your main menu (bottom menu)
  • Access the program that interests you in your academics search engine.
  • Click on "request information" or save it to your favorites.

*You can also access the page of any academic organization of your interest and access the PROGRAMS section, where you will be able to access and request information about any program you are interested in.

Since the moment you request information about a program, how long will it take until the academic organization get ́s in touch with you?

After you send the information request, it’s up to the academic organization to get in touch with you. It shouldn ́t take too long as academic organizations are aware that the sooner they get back to you, the better.

Be sure to leave your contact details on the request form, either through Impulsyn or through their website.

Organizations will usually call you or send you an email. The admissions representatives can also connect with you and send you a message in Impulsyn.
faqs.option7text:
Can I send a message to an user I ́m not connected with?

No, you can only send and receive messages from users you have added to your network.

How can you send a message or contact a user outside of your network?

If you want to send a message to any user outside of your network, you will have to send them a connection request first and then send a message after they have accepted the connection request.

Is there any way to contact another user without sending a message?

In your profile you can also share other contact information such as your email, your phone or your website (in case you have one). These fields are not mandatory but some users may have them visible if they have their profile in public mode. You will be able to access this information by clicking on the agenda located in the upper right part of any user's profile.

Also remember that you can interact with other users who are not in your network by liking, commenting or sharing any of their posts, as long as their profile is public.
faqs.option8text:
Where can I see who viewed my profile?

You can see who has viewed your profile by clicking on your profile icon on the left side of your top menu on your home page. This will open a menu with different options, including who viewed your profile.

What is the purpose of knowing who viewed your profile?

Knowing who viewed your profile is a very useful option to know the position or where do they work the users who has seeing your profile.

One of Impulsyn’s main objectives is to help you to start or continue developing your career in the sports industry, which is why we want to show you the importance of getting a good and big network that can help you achieve your goals in your sports career.

Can I see all users who viewed my profile?

Yes, you can see who and when someone has viewed your profile.
faqs.option9: The 3 type of pages you can create
faqs.option9text:
The difference between "user" and "page"

In order to create a page you must first create a user account at Impulsyn. From your user account you will be able to create an organization page.

How can you create a page?

You can create a page from your user account by clicking on your profile icon on the left side of your top menu on your home page. This will open a menu with different options, including the create page option. Click on it and begin to complete all the information about your organization.

What type of pages can you create?

At Impulsyn, we want you, as an organization, to be able to achieve all your goals within the sports industry. That's why we allow you to create 3 types of pages

1. Pages for sports organizations

2. Pages for academic organizations

3. Pages for other type of organizations

Pages for sports organizations

This type of page is perfect for clubs, academies, federations, leagues, associations, sporting goods companies, representation, sports marketing agencies, gyms, companies that organize sports events and tournaments, sports technology platforms...

By creating your sports organization page you will be able to:

  • Post your opportunities or job opportunities to attract the best talent in your sports area.
  • Share the latest news about your organization in the sports industry.
  • Connect with other users from the industry interested in your organization or your products and services.
Pages for academic organizations

This type of page is ideal for universities, graduate schools or other academic organizations that offer undergraduate programs, graduate programs or specialized courses in the sports industry or in any specific sport. We are talking about any kind of academic offer related to sports, from a master's degree in journalism or sports marketing, to an MBA in sports management or a degree in physical activity and health sciences, to coaching, refereeing or sports management courses for any sport.

By creating your academic organization page you will be able to:

  • Post your undergraduate & graduate programs or any kind of sports-related academic course.
  • Get qualified "leads" (information requests from potential students) to be able to recruit more students for your organization.
  • Share the latest news from your academic organization in the sports industry
  • Post your job opportunities to attract the best talent
Pages for other type of organizations

This type of page fits perfectly for organizations that are not sports companies, but currently work or want to start working in the sports industry. We are talking about organizations who are not sports entities, but currently sponsor or collaborate with sports companies or projects: consultancy firms, fast moving consumer goods, banks, automotive, airlines...

If you have a company or a project and you currently work or want to start working in the sports industry, this is your site.

By creating your page for another type of organization you will be able to:

  • Share your organization's latest sports-related news.
  • Post your job opportunities related to sports.
  • Connect and find opportunities for your organization in the sports industry, either with athletes, coaches....or with other members or different sports organizations in the industry.
faqs.option10text:
The difference between "connecting" and "follow"

At Impulsyn you will be able to connect with users and follow pages. If you follow a page, all the Highlights they post will be able to appear on your news feed.

Can you send a message to any organization?

No, you can ́t. On the organization ́s page you can click and see their website, interact with their highlights and apply to the opportunities they offer. You will also be able to request information about the different academic programs they offer, in case they are an academic organization page.

How can you contact any organization?

The quickest way to connect with an organization is to hit the "follow" button, this way you will always be up to date with what is going on in that organization.

Also, we recommend you to connect or contact the people who work or represent an organization. Remember that people are the ones behind any company or entity. It will be your fastest way to interact with them.
faqs.option11text:
How to post opportunities?

In order to post an opportunity, you first must create an organization page from your user account. Once you create the page you have 2 ways to post any opportunity:

1. Access your page and click on the settings wheel located on the right side of your top menu. Click on the wheel and then select the option "post opportunity". From there, you can begin to complete your opportunity. Once you have finished, click on "post".

2. Access your page and click on your "opportunities" section. Then click on the "Add Opportunity" button.

Choose how you want to receive the applications from the opportunities you offer

Before posting the opportunity your organization offers, you can choose to receive the applications in 2 ways:

1. Receive email with user information since the users will make the application within the platform. This is the best and most convenient way for the users, who will be able to carry out the whole application process in Impulsyn.

2. Receive them on your website. You will be able to redirect the users from Impulsyn to your website so that they can carry out the application process there. The user will see the opportunity in Impulsyn and will make the application form on your website.

*When you are creating a new opportunity, you will have the option of adding a link to your website or organization's landing page where users will be redirected to apply to the opportunity.
faqs.option12text:
Where can you see the applications you receive?

Remember that with every opportunity you post on Impulsyn, you can choose how you want to receive applications.

If you choose to receive them through your website, you will use external programs to view the applications. But if you choose to receive the applications through Impulsyn (we recommend it) you will receive an email for each application with the information of the user who did it.

How can you contact your favorite candidates?

With each opportunity you post, you will usually receive several applications. It ́s up to you how to engage with those candidates.

  • You will be able to access the candidate's profile in Impulsyn where you can connect with him/her or send him/her a message.

You decide how to contact those applicants interested in your opportunities.
faqs.option13text:
How can you post academic programs?

In order to publish an academic program, you must have an academic organization page from your user account. You can only post an academic program from an academic organization page. Once you have created the page you can post any academic program in two ways:

1. Access your page and click on the settings wheel located on the right side of your top menu. Click on the wheel and then select the option "post academic program". From there you can start to complete your program and once you have finished, click on "post".

2. Access your page and click on your "academics" section. Then click on the "Add program" button

Choose how to receive the leads from the potential students interested in your academic programs

Before posting the program offered by your academic organization, you can choose to receive the leads in two ways:

1. Receive email with user information since the users will make the application within the platform. This is the best and most convenient way for the users, who will be able to carry out the whole application process in Impulsyn.

2. Receive all the leads on your website. You will be able to redirect the users from Impulsyn to your website so that they can carry out the information request process there. The user will see the academic program in Impulsyn and will make the contact form on your website.

*When you are creating a new program, you will have the option of adding a link to your website or organization's landing page where users will be redirected to request more information about the program.
faqs.option14: Recruit students for your academic organization
faqs.option14text:
Where can you see all the leads you receive?

Remember that with each program you post from your academic organization page in Impulsyn, you will be able to choose how you want to receive the leads (information requests from users about your academic programs).

If you choose to receive them through your website, you will use external programs to view the leads. But if you choose to receive the leads through Impulsyn (we recommend it) you will receive an email for each lead with the information of the user who did it.

How can you contact all the leads that requested information about any academic program?

With each program you post you will usually receive some leads. Remember that it is very important that you contact the users interested in your programs as soon as possible.

  • You will be able to access the candidate's profile in Impulsyn where you can connect with him/her or send him/her a message.

You decide how to contact those leads interested in your programs.
faqs.option15text:
What is a page administrator?

Administrators are the users who manage a page on Impulsyn. To be an administrator you must either have created a page or have been invited as a page administrator by another user who has already created a page.

A page administrator can control everything you do from the organization page: posting opportunities, academic programs or highlights.

How many administrators can there be per page?

There can be a maximum of 5 administrators per page. That is, a user who creates a page can invite a maximum of 4 more users to manage the same page.

Can I invite a user I am not connected to to manage my page?

As a page administrator you can only send an invitation to manage a page to those users with whom you are already connected.

Do all administrators have the same role?

Yes, all administrators have the same roles and can access all sections & functionalities within the page.
faqs.option16text:
How to post a highlights from your page?

You can post from your page whenever you want by clicking on the floating button on your home page.

When you manage a page and you want to post a highlight, in addition to being able to post as an user, Impulsyn allows you to post also as a page. Please pay always attention to who makes the post in case you manage a page.

On your wall you can publish text, links, photos, videos related to your organization. The idea is that you make known all the news of your organization within the sports industry.

What content can you post as a page?

Impulsyn is a social network with the aim of professionalizing the sports industry creating many more opportunities for the entire sector. Depending on your type of page you will post one type of content or another. The important thing is that the content you post is related to your activity and allows you to share everything you consider of interest to other users in addition to achieving the goals you set for your organization.

Who can see the highlights on your page?

When you post from your page all your highlights will be public. In addition, all the posts you make will be stored on your page. You will be able to edit or delete them whenever you want. Your posts will appear on the news feed of the users who follow your organization page in Impulsyn.

downloadNewVersion.text:
There is a new version of the application available.

Download it to continue enjoying Impulsyn
